amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute provides for the consideration in the House of the bill (H.R. 5710) to establish the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a complete new text and makes a technical correction.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Diaz-Balart amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
